inclusion.criterion: large stones (>1.8 cm in size) of the upper ureter
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: the patients planing to be treated with other treatment except laparoscopic
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: ureterolithotomy about the upper ureter stone
exclusion.label: met

notes: 78 year-old male with history of BPH and multiple urological procedures, including suprapubic prostatectomy. Has a severe 2cm bulbar urethral stricture that requires surgical fixation.
